enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The issue of nuclear energy in the CDM resurfaced on Wednesday, with a number of observers picking up on possible shifts in positions among some Parties.

While talk in the corridors suggested that some developing countries seemed to be taking a more favorable view on including nuclear energy, some commentators pointed to recent comments by a key Annex I Party that suggested it might in fact be softening on its previously pro-nuclear attitude.
